snippet: The sentencing comes after an altercation led to anti-Muslim riots in which more than 40 people were killed in central Myanmar last month.
abstract: Muslim shop owner, his wife and an employee are sentenced to 14 years in prison after altercation at their gold shop led to anti-Muslim riots in which more than 40 people were killed in central Myanmar.
lead_paragraph: The sentencing comes after an altercation led to anti-Muslim riots in which more than 40 people were killed in central Myanmar last month.

headline.main: Myanmar: 3 Sentenced for Role in Riots
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: 3 Sentenced for Role in Riots
